title: Normanton Walks

images.title: Normanton War Memorial by derek dye, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Normanton War Memorial

description: This West Yorkshire town is located in the City of Wakefield . This walk in the town takes you around Haw Hill Park where there are some nice surfaced footpaths, a duck pond and lawned areas. The park also includes a play area, gym areas, memorials and tennis courts.
